description: Go to Study Hall. If you pass Go, do not collect.
200€ fall into your hands from the sky. Collect 200€.
Your notebooks fall into a puddle, you need to buy new ones. Pay 50€
You sell your old textbooks. Collect 50€.
Get out of Study Hall for free!
You worked as a tutor for a lower grade. Collect 200€
It is your birthday. Collect 20€ from every player.
Your schoolbook came torn, you get a 20€ refund.
Furniture fee. Pay 40€ per chair and 115€ per table.
You won the second prize in a school olympiad. Collect 10€.
You won the pumpkin carving contest. Collect 100€.
You destroyed the grade 11 bathroom. Pay 100€.
